purpleculture_pinyin:
zhì
to toss; to throw dice; Taiwan pr. [zhi2]
бросать; бросать кости; Тайвань пр. [zhi2]
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 掷)
Pictophonetic: 鄭 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 擲地有聲 [ zhì dì yǒu shēng ]: lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom); fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating; to have substance
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 鄭 [ zhèng ] state in today's Henan; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: When you found the pinnacle's city walls you dropped to your knees, gripped the soil with your fingers, and hurled because you were so happy, but out of breath and had a big lunch.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) from the ancient Chinese province (鄭) strikes
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. Zheng will hurl you off the cliff with his fingers if you try to steal the golden calf.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand " to the sound of " Zheng ". The original meaning of investment, throwing. "Shuowen" is written as " Kai ", and later written as " Throw ". Examples such as "Hou Han Shu. "Lü Bu Chuan": "(Lu Bu) tasted a small failure, Zhuo pulls out his hand and throws it." "Book of Jin. "The Biography of Pan Yue": "When Zhang is very ugly, every line, the child throws cobblestones at it, but hesitates them." Sikong Tu of the Tang Dynasty "Chun Sorrow Fu": "The empty throw of resentment is the same as the long night.

" Toss " also means to jump. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Fake idiot": "(Yuan) Shaoqi is forced to throw it by himself, so I will avoid it." Le Peng Turtle of the Tang Dynasty "Xichuan Qingyang Palace Inscription": "Lan crane squats, dragon and snake throw."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of " Zheng ". The original meaning of investment, throwing.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「鄭」聲。本義投、拋。《說文》作「擿」，後寫作「擲」。例子如《後漢書．呂布傳》：「（呂布）嘗小失卓意，卓拔手戟擲之。」《晉書．潘岳傳》：「時張載甚醜，每行，小兒以瓦石擲之，委頓而反。」唐代司空圖〈春愁賦〉：「怨韶光之虛擲，與長夜而還同。」

　　「擲」又表示跳躍。如《世說新語．假譎》：「（袁）紹遑迫自擲出，遂以俱免。」唐代樂朋龜〈西川青羊宮碑銘〉：「鸞鶴翹蹲，龍蛇騰擲。」

從「 手 」，「 鄭 」聲。本義投、拋。《說文》作「 擿 」，後寫作「 擲 」。例子如《後漢書．呂布傳》：「（呂布）嘗小失卓意，卓拔手戟擲之。」《晉書．潘岳傳》：「時張載甚醜，每行，小兒以瓦石擲之，委頓而反。」唐代司空圖〈春愁賦〉：「怨韶光之虛擲，與長夜而還同。」 「 擲 」又表示跳躍。如《世說新語．假譎》：「（袁）紹遑迫自擲出，遂以俱免。」唐代樂朋龜〈西川青羊宮碑銘〉：「鸞鶴翹蹲，龍蛇騰擲。」
From the " hand" to the sound of " Zheng". The original meaning of investment, throwing. "Shuowen" is written as " Kai", and later written as " Throw". Examples such as "Hou Han Shu. "Lü Bu Chuan": "(Lu Bu) tasted a small failure, Zhuo pulls out his hand and throws it." "Book of Jin. "The Biography of Pan Yue": "When Zhang is very ugly, every line, the child throws cobblestones at it, but hesitates them." Sikong Tu of the Tang Dynasty "Chun Sorrow Fu": "The empty throw of resentment is the same as the long night. " Toss" also means to jump. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Fake idiot": "(Yuan) Shaoqi is forced to throw it by himself, so I will avoid it." Le Peng Turtle of the Tang Dynasty "Xichuan Qingyang Palace Inscription": "Lan crane squats, dragon and snake throw."

擲字的基本解释

擲
zhì
见“掷”。

擲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直炙切，入昔，澄。］
“掷1”的繁体字。
(1)投；抛。
(2)引申指抛弃。
(3)投射。
(4)腾跳；纵跃。
(5)振动；飘动。
(6)撒下，撒播。

擲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擲； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页461第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直隻切，音躑。讀若呈入聲。投也，振也。【增韻】拋也，掉也。與擿同。【晉書·孫綽傳】嘗作天台山賦，以示范榮期云：卿試擲地，當作金石聲也。【杜牧·阿房宮賦】鼎鐺玉石，金塊珠礫，弃擲邐迤。秦人視之，亦不甚惜。

擲字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擲字的起名意思

暂无。

[Mao Collection] [Hands and Characters Department] 　 Throw; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: Page 461 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Straight cut only, the sound is swayed. If you read it, you will hear it. Cast also, Zhenye. [Zeng Yun] Throw it, drop it. Same as Zhuo. [Book of Jin·Sun Chuo Biography] Taste it as a Tiantai Mountain Fu to demonstrate Rong Qiyun: Qing try to throw the ground, as the sound of gold and stone. [Du Mu·A Fanggong Fu] Dingdang jade, gold nugget, beads and gravel, discarded throwing daggers. The people of Qin regarded it, and did not hesitate.
